definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="192">This drops one seed when the ungrown crop is broken.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeartShapedHerbSeeds</field><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="141">Set this to your seed item for your crops.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
